report.title: Opiates Junkie
report.author: Notorious K.I.D.
report.bodytext: dose: 32mg-24hrs /n /n This stuff saved my ass. I was snorting 600mg or more of Oxycontin ever day. Then I wanted to get clean and went to a doctor here in town. He put me on this med and I was able to avoid 98% of the typical withdrawls. THANK GOD. /n /n Peace
